CaDRReS model¶

Training a model¶

cadrres.model.create_placeholders(n_x_features, n_y_features, sample_weight=False)[source]¶

sample_logistic_weight_df (sample, drug) contains x0 for each logistic curve of sample weight.

cadrres.model.get_model_param(pg_space)[source]¶

Get model paramters

Parameters

model_param_fname (string) – Name of trained model (hdf5 file)

Returns

Dict of model parameters

cadrres.model.get_training_info(pg_space)[source]¶

Get training information

Parameters

model_param_dict (dict) – Dict of model parameters

Returns

Dataframe of model training info (drug confidence, etc.)

cadrres.model.load_model(model_fname)[source]¶

Load a pre-trained model

Parameters

model_name – gdsc, gdsc-no-bias, ccle, gdsc-cyto, gdsc-target, gdsc-no-bias-cyto, gdsc-no-bias-target
